text.div:
Neonatal Severe Neurological Procedures

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    173784007 Open insertion of feeding tube into stomach (procedure)
    386329003 Treatment of hypothermia (procedure)
    431493005 Insertion of nasogastric feeding tube using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    431722009 Insertion of nasojejunal feeding tube using fluoroscopic guidance (procedure)
    445839007 Insertion of nasogastric feeding tube using endoscopy for upper gastrointestinal tract guidance (procedure)
    473371002 Electromyography for disorder of central nervous system (procedure)
    698351007 Insertion of feeding tube into duodenum (procedure)
    698507004 Insertion of feeding tube into small intestine (procedure)
    698508009 Insertion of feeding tube into esophagus (procedure)
